events.text:
Not bad!
You can also use your [wave amp=50 freq=2][color=#9400d3]m[/color][color=#4B0082]a[/color][color=#0000ff]g[/color][color=#00ff00]i[/color][color=#ffff00]c[/color][color=#ff7f00]a[/color][color=#ff0000]l[/color][/wave] powers to float!
Hold [color=yellow]shift[/color] to float! Try it for a few seconds!
